name: Ultra Kaiju Fighter
description:
A submission for Kaiju Jam 2!

Battle against your  *very capable* opponent in a fight for global domination in Super Kaiju Fighter! Combine the attack button with a single directional input to perform combo attacks; button combos will perform different attacks if performed after other attacks, during a dodge, or in the air vs on the ground. Charge your energy to release a ranged blast on your next combo.

I hilariously expected to make an actual fighting game but quickly came back to reality and realized that I had massively over-scoped. Instead of simplifying, I leaned into it and decided to just do a simple fighting engine and make it look/feel as best as I could given the time constraints. Happy with how it turned out, but I have no plans as of now to take it anywhere. That could change, though. We'll see.

Controls (Keyboard):

Arrow Keys: move, double tap to dodge/sprint

Z: attack

X + Down: charge energy

Space: jump

M: mute music

R: Reset opponent position

ESC: quit

Controls (Gamepad - use XBox One controller for reference):

D-Pad: move, double tap to dodge/sprint

X: Attack

A: Jump

B + DPad Down: Charge energy

All modeling, animation, art direction, game design, and programming done by Carlo Sbisa over two weeks in 2023 for Kaiju Jam 2.
